de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess

type
class
subclasses
de.polygonal.ds.mem.BitMemory, de.polygonal.ds.mem.ByteMemory, de.polygonal.ds.mem.DoubleMemory, de.polygonal.ds.mem.FloatMemory, de.polygonal.ds.mem.IntMemory, de.polygonal.ds.mem.ShortMemory

Instance Variables

bytes(__bytes,null) : Int

The number of allocated bytes.

offset(__offset,null) : Int

The memory offset in bytes.

Instance Methods

clear() : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Memory was already deallocated (if debug flag is set).
Sets all bytes to zero.

free() : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Memory was already deallocated (if debug flag is set).
Releases allocated memory. Invoke this method before the instance is garbage collected to prevent a memory leak.

resize(bytes : Int) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError bytes <= 0 (if debug flag is set).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Memory was already deallocated (if debug flag is set).
Resizes the memory to bytes.
